message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you for $180. I think you'll find it's a fantastic deal.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $150. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $150 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $165.  I believe this product will be a valuable asset for you.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $165, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to meet me at $155?
